name: HaikuTime
0:
”Alexa, tell Haiku time to read me a haiku”
”Alexa, ask haiku time to inspire me”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Time to slam some poetry!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku time
des:
Haiku Time is a simple way to hear a different Haiku each time you ask for one. Haiku's can be fun and silly too. The purpose is to hear something unexpected that could make you laugh, think, or simply react to what you hear. 

All you have to do is ask Haiku Time to read from it's inventory of Haikus. You can ask things like :
Alexa, ask Haiku Time to read me a poem.
or
Alexa, ask Haiku Time to inspire me.

Maybe you'll be inspired to create your own today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
